name: Column
description:
Column is a Wonderfully Minimalistic Isometric Puzzle Game with Beautiful Scenery and a Variety of Modes.

Face 12 Arcade Chronicles to be Rewarded with a Challenging Eternal Mode.

Compete with the World, Earn Custom Safe Zones and Much More.

• Chronicles: 12 Challenges, Each Tougher than the Last.
• Eternal: An Unlockable Endless Mode.
• Precision: Prove your Accuracy in a Unique Freestyle Stage.

Collecting Tiles Sounds Easy, Right?
